item.title: Trump pressures China and India to stop buying cheap Russian oil
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump is urging China and India to stop buying oil from Russia

item.title: Asian shares track rally on Wall Street that won back most of Friday's wipeout
item.description: Asian shares have followed U.S. stocks higher after they won back most of their sharp loss from last week

item.title: Australia selects Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy Industries for $6.5B warship deal
item.description: Australia says it has accepted a Japanese company's bid for a lucrative and hotly contested contract to build Australian naval vessels, expected to be...

item.title: In rejecting the jobs report, Trump follows his own playbook of discrediting unfavorable data
item.description: President Donald Trump has a pattern of dismissing or altering data that reflects poorly on him

item.title: Modi and Trump once called each other good friends. Now the US-India relationship is getting bumpy
item.description: The friendliness between Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and U.S. President Donald Trump was seen as a relationship like no other
